Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Blissful \Bliss"ful\, a. Full of, characterized by, or causing, joy and felicity; happy in the highest degree. ``Blissful solitude.'' --Milton. -- {Bliss"ful*ly}, adv. -- {Bliss"ful*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
blissful adj : completely happy and contented; "blissful young lovers"; "in blissful ignorance"
